name: COMIBNER- A COMBINE GAME
description:
COMBINER A COMBINE GAME

CONTROLS

A/S  or  arrow keys  -steer

collect as much grass as possible without touching rocks which will  destroy your harvester

online leader boar enter a username at end of game to save your high score

-known issue of the game failing to be downloaded from the itch app , game can still be downloaded from the website this will be patched in a later build(due to the time constraints of the jam)
